name: Mars Platformer
description:
A game hastily made for the University of Toronto Game Design and Development Club's game jam on September 27/28, 2015. Try to place a flag on all three golden platforms.

WASD to move.

G to drop flags.

Mouse to aim and shoot.

Escape to quit.

R to restart game.

People on the team:

Calvin Luo

Kelvin Lai

Person #3
